se.cbb.jprime.mcmc

Class ConstantThinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.cbb.jprime.mcmc.ConstantThinner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InfoProvider, IterationListener, Thinner

    public class ConstantThinner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Thinner, IterationListener
    Implementation of an constant thinner, i.e., where every j-th iteration should be sampled for some invariant j. The starting iteration 0 is also naturally sampled.
    Author:
    Joel Sj√∂strand.

      • ConstantThinner

        public ConstantThinner(Iteration iter,
               int factor)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        iter - the iteration on which sampling is based.
        factor - how often to sample, i.e. every factor-th iteration.
